comments.content: No match, but you might like [Arame](http://web.archive.org/web/20080113144459/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dimitrelima/0arame/)?

Thank you for your help. I was asking for a colleague.

I don’t use fonts, I only make them.
Vertex and Arame) are way cool! :-) Mikey
